X.iv.3.A.4.b
.
Complaints of Financial Exploitation in Pension Cases
In cases where a claims processor receives a specific complaint alleging a claimant was financially exploited (pension poaching), refer the complaint to Pension and Fiduciary Service, Quality and Oversight Team, at
VAVBAWAS/CO/P&F TNG QUAL OVRST
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section A  - Fraud and Laboratory Analysis of Evidence
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section A
